architectural_notes: Message IDs use a global counter starting at 000000001, incrementing sequentially across all threads and messages
Message ID format auto-expands beyond 9 digits if needed (10, 11, etc.)
Message IDs stored in backend and displayed with each message (4chan-style post numbering)

existing_features.title: Display the message ID in the MessageBubble component for all messages, styled to match 4chan's post numbering system appearance

new_feature_requests.summary: Re-add message IDs to all messages (9-digit sequential format, global counter)
Add a global message ID counter in the backend that starts at 1 and increments sequentially for every message created (including creator posts and all replies across all chatrooms)
Add an id field of type Text to the Message type in the backend that stores the formatted message ID
Format message IDs as zero-padded 9-digit strings (e.g., '000000001', '000000042'), automatically expanding to 10+ digits when the counter exceeds 999999999
Do not add any authorization checks or caller verification for message ID assignment

projectName: Re-add sequential message IDs to all messages
